allow: Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Set-Location ''c:\\Users\\cyril\\Documents\\VScode\\buzzcontrol\\server-go''; go mod tidy; go build -v ./cmd/server")
Bash(cmd.exe /c "C:\\Go\\bin\\go.exe version 2>nul || C:\\Program Files\\Go\\bin\\go.exe version 2>nul || echo Go not found in standard paths")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "if \(Test-Path ''C:\\Go\\bin\\go.exe''\) { Write-Host ''Found at C:\\Go\\bin\\go.exe'' } elseif \(Test-Path ''C:\\Program Files\\Go\\bin\\go.exe''\) { Write-Host ''Found at C:\\Program Files\\Go\\bin\\go.exe'' } else { Get-ChildItem -Path C:\\ -Filter go.exe -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -First 1 -ExpandProperty FullName }")
Bash(cmd.exe /c "for /f ""tokens=5"" %a in \(''netstat -ano ^| findstr :1234 ^| findstr LISTEN''\) do taskkill /PID %a /F")
Bash(cmd.exe /c "wmic process where processid=653144 get caption,commandline,executablepath 2>nul")
